snippet.title: Succubus Hellish Orgy VR: Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
RELEASE DATE:  20.07.2023  (GOG.com)
https://www.gog.com/pl/game/succubus_hellish_orgy_vr

STORY
Become a slave of the legendary sex demon - Succubus named Vydija!
The demon known from the world of "The World of Agony" decides to make you the chosen one! A special servant to fulfill the special wishes of his mistress.

Fulfill the requests of your Succubus to receive extremely attractive rewards in the form of more scenes with your mistress!

main features:

• Intense and brutal action using VR controllers
• Bow and Sword Combat system
• Interactive sex minigames
• Puzzles and hidden passages
• Diversified opponents
• Character Customization
• A rich and diverse world of Hell
• A hostile environment full of traps and enemies
• Surreal visual setting and gore


Official Social Media:

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/WorldofAgony

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/vydija
https://twitter.com/World_of_Agony

Discord:
https://discord.gg/NhnNxDEr63
